I'll be going to Tokyo on vacation at Christmas which I'm looking forward to. Ny uncle went there on vacation last year at Easter. He said the holiday satisfied his expectation. I enjoy visiting the annual winter carnival where I ride the roller coasters and eat sushi soaking up the nice christmassy atmosphere. The sun has been dazzlingly bright the whole week sk you may just ad well have a good long soak in an outdoor onsen soaking up the sun. In fact I've just got out of an onsen in Kawaguchiko and am drying myself on a towel. For tokyo a dazzling sun has been forecast for the whole week. In Kyoto there's been a long spell of dry hot weather whereas in osaka there's been a long spell of wet cold weather. In Hiroshima the weather forecast is for a hot and sunny day and a warm and breezy night tomorrow just right for swimming. In Hong Kong the weather forecast is for sunny spells and scattered showers all week. For Kagoshima heavy rain and scattered hail showers have been forecast for tomorrow whereas for Miyazaki light rainfall and light snowfalls have been predicted just right for skiing. For Fukuoka a sunny and breezy day has been forecast just right for sailing while for Nagasaki sleet showers and heavy rain have been predicted. In Okinawa the weather forecast said there would be dry sunny spells and light rainfall today. It also stated it was going to be hot and sunny tomorrow. Of course snow showers and sleet showers are much better than thundery showers and wintry showers. In Hokkaido we had fog and drizzle earlier but now it's sunny. Yesterday I forgot my raincoat and umbrella so I got caught in a rain shower while touring the tourist attractions there and a sleet shower on my way to the hotel.
In osaka it was snowing earlier but now its drizzling.
